articles.title: Irrfan Khan death: Actors rare photo of watching 2018 Lords Test circulates on Twitter - Republic World - Republic World
articles.description: Irrfan Khan death: A Twitter user on Wednesday posted a throwback image of Irrfan Khan watching an England vs Pakistan cricket match at Lord's back in 2018.
articles.content: The Irrfan Khan death news on Wednesday came as a huge shock not only for his fans, but also for the Bollywood fraternity. The 53-year-old was admitted to Mumbai's Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani hospital on Tuesday before he breathed his last on Wednesday morning… [+3489 chars]

articles.title: Rishi Kapoor funeral: Actor to be cremated at Chandanwadi Crematorium in Mumbai - India Today
articles.description: Veteran actor Rishi Kapoor died at the age of 67 on Thursday at 8.45 am. He will be cremated at the Chandanwadi Crematorium.
articles.content:
Veteran actor Rishi Kapoor died on April 30 at 8.45 am. In a statement released to the media, his family confirmed the news. He died after a two-year battle with leukemia, said the statement.
Randhir Kapoor confirmed that Rishi Kapoor will be cremated in Cha… [+2107 chars]
